thread.title: LivePerson to Ring Nasdaq Stock Market Opening Bell to Celebrate 20 Year Anniversary
thread.title_full: LivePerson to Ring Nasdaq Stock Market Opening Bell to Celebrate 20 Year Anniversary

title: LivePerson to Ring Nasdaq Stock Market Opening Bell to Celebrate 20 Year Anniversary
text: LivePerson to Ring Nasdaq Stock Market Opening Bell to Celebrate 20 Year Anniversary   Published on 2015-10-19 12:59:57 LivePerson to Ring Nasdaq Stock Market Opening Bell to Celebrate 20 Year... -- NEW YORK, Oct. 19,   LivePerson Logo. LivePerson Logo.  ><- stripped tags -> NEW YORK , Oct. 19,   LivePerson, Inc. (NASDAQ: [[]]), a leading provider of digital engagement solutions, announced that it will ring the opening bell at the Nasdaq Stock Market on Tuesday, October 20, 2015 . LivePerson founder and CEO, Robert LoCascio , members of LivePerson's board of directors, valued customers, and guests will gather at the Nasdaq MarketSite in Times Square on Tuesday morning in celebration of LivePerson's 20th anniversary. The opening bell ceremony will kick off LivePerson's annual user event, [[UEdFZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCdmJtTnNhV05yUFNkc2FXNXJUMjVEYkdsamF5aDBhR2x6S1NjZ2FISmxaajFjSW1oMGRIQTZMeTkzZDNjdWJHbDJaWEJsY25OdmJpNWpiMjB2WVhOd2FYSmxMMkZuWlc1a1lWd2lJSEpsYkQxY0ltNXZabTlzYkc5M1hDSWdkR0Z5WjJWMFBWd2lYMkpzWVc1clhDSStRWE53YVhKbFBDOWhQZz09fA==]], being held at Hudson Mercantile on October 21, 2015 . "Over the last 20 years, LivePerson has grown rapidly, cementing our industry leadership due to a focus on innovation, security and enterprise-class scalability, while demonstrating the value we continuously provide to brands and consumers alike," said LoCascio. Founded in 1995 in New York City , LivePerson has since grown into a global company with more than 1,000 employees and 12 offices around the world, and more than 18,000 brands, including many of the Fortune 500 companies. Since LivePerson pioneered online messaging, its platform has seen tremendous growth in consumer connections, from 500,000 in 2001 to now more than 25 million connections a month. "LivePerson has remained steadfast in our mission to create meaningful connections between brands and consumers and to challenge anything that stands in the way of that. The 1-800 number is still the predominant channel of connection for brands, and it is causing a lot of consumer frustration and time wasted on hold," said LoCascio. "Consumers have moved on from voice to mobile messaging when they connect with friends and families, and it's time for brands to now make that shift. We have built LiveEngage to help brands bridge this disconnect. Through LiveEngage, brands no longer put valued customers on hold, and instead stay connected through secure and scalable mobile messaging-- in the pocket of consumers." This theme will be the focus of Wednesday's Aspire, which will feature discussions led by industry experts and thought leaders from brands that also see the power of online and mobile messaging, including: Backcountry, Royal Bank of Scotland , TalkTalk and Westpac Bank. The one-day event will help attendees create valuable connections and gain insight into how leading brands are differentiating the customer experience through connection. Aspire will also include demonstrations of the latest features of LiveEngage, best-practices breakout sessions led by customer experts, and technology deep-dives hosted by LivePerson specialists. About LivePersonLivePerson, Inc. (Nasdaq: LPSN ) offers a cloud-based platform that enables businesses to proactively connect in real-time with their customers via chat, voice, and content delivery at the right time, through the right channel, including websites, social media, and mobile devices. This "intelligent engagement" is driven by real-time behavioral analytics, producing connections based on a true understanding of business objectives and customer needs. For more information, please visit www.liveperson.com . To view other global press releases about LivePerson, please visit pr.liveperson.com . Media Contact: Erin Kang , 212-609-4256
